LSM303D

STMicroelectronics accelerometer and magnetometer

  • Device address 29
  • Address type 7-bit

8-bytes

Read-only

Magnetometer X

Raw magnetometer data on X plane

8-bytes

Read-only

Magnetometer X

Read-only

Read-only

Read-only

Functions

  • acceleration.asG - Measures the current acceleration
  • acceleration.xPlane - Measures the current acceleration
  • acceleration.yPlane - Measures the current acceleration
  • acceleration.zPlane - Measures the current acceleration
  • orientation.heading - Reads the magnetic orientation
  • orientation.xPlane - Reads the magnetic orientation
  • orientation.yPlane - Reads the magnetic orientation
  • orientation.zPlane - Reads the magnetic orientation
